display_name: Overall Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=2% desaturation or arousal
description: Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=2% desaturation or arousal  [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with >=2% desaturation or arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hremba2 +hroa2 + hnrba2 + hnroa2 +carba2+ caroa2 + canba2 + canoa2 + oarba2 + oaroa2 + oanba2 + oanoa2 + marbpa2 + maropa2 + manrbpa2 + manropa2) / slpprdp
